statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); project_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.project_dir'); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); style=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.output_style.name'); if [[ "$cwd" == "$project_dir" ]]; then dir="."; elif [[ "$cwd" == "$HOME" ]]; then dir="~"; elif [[ "$cwd" == "$HOME"/* ]]; then dir="~${cwd#$HOME}"; else dir="$cwd"; fi; git_info=""; if git -C "$cwd" rev-parse --git-dir > /dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git -C "$cwd" --no-optional-locks branch --show-current 2>/dev/null); if [[ -n "$branch" ]]; then remote=$(git -C "$cwd" --no-optional-locks rev-parse --abbrev-ref --symbolic-full-name @{u} 2>/dev/null | sed 's#origin/##'); if [[ -n "$remote" ]] && [[ "$remote" != "$branch" ]]; then branch="$branch:$remote"; fi; if ! git -C "$cwd" --no-optional-locks diff --quiet 2>/dev/null || ! git -C "$cwd" --no-optional-locks diff --cached --quiet 2>/dev/null; then branch="$branch*"; fi; git_info=" $(printf '\033[35m')on$(printf '\033[0m') $(printf '\033[35m')$branch$(printf '\033[0m')"; fi; fi; right="$git_info"; if [[ -n "$model" ]]; then right="$right $(printf '\033[34m')[$model]$(printf '\033[0m')"; fi; if [[ -n "$style" ]] && [[ "$style" != "default" ]]; then right="$right $(printf '\033[33m')($style)$(printf '\033[0m')"; fi; echo "$(printf '\033[36m')$dir$(printf '\033[0m')$right"
